com.mockrunner.example.ejb

Class BillEntityBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mockrunner.example.ejb.BillEntityBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.ejb.EnterpriseBean, javax.ejb.EntityBean

    public abstract class BillEntityBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ejb.EntityBean
    This CMP entity bean represents a bill. It has a date, and a marker if it is paid. It has two custom finders, namely findUnpaid() and findAll().
    See Also:
